paper_abstract: In the paper, immune algorithm(IA) is proposed for optimizing membership function of fuzzy variables for mining associate rules. It is used in network detection to testify its efficiency in such mining task, including maximizing the similarity between normal association rule sets while minimizing the similarity between a normal and an abnormal association rule set. Experiment results show that IA-optiniization based fuzzy logic system can improve the performance of mining associate rules in network intrusion.
paper_title: Immune algorithm optimization of membership functions for mining association rules
